TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生事件時的選取狀態來自變更選取為已取消選取或取消選取此選項為選取。The event occurs when the selection state of a changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected. 如果不會發生處於虛擬模式。The will not occur if the is in virtual mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#478](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#478)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#478](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#478)]

param.span: 表示項目的狀態變更為已選取，而 則表示項目的狀態變更為已取消選取。

span.span: to indicate the item's state has changed to selected; to indicate the item's state has changed to deselected.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

public: property bool IsSelected { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出項目的狀態是否變更為已選取。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the item's state has changed to selected.

value.span: 如果項目的狀態變更為已選取，則為 ，但如果項目的狀態變更為已取消選取，則為 。

span.span: if the item's state has changed to selected; if the item's state has changed to deselected.
